title: Investment Diversification: Don't Put All Your Eggs in One Basket
excerpt: Learn how diversification reduces risk and helps protect your portfolio.
editorial_summary: This article explains investment diversification principles, including asset allocation, geographic diversification, and sector diversification. It covers how to build a diversified portfolio across stocks, bonds, and other asset classes, and explains why diversification matters for long-term wealth building. Includes examples of well-diversified portfolios and common diversification mistakes to avoid.
